history: JSON file for BOBYQA/DFOLS tests on MOPS model. example_dfols.json file copied and adjusted by Sophy Oliver 16-May-2018
svnInfo_comment: Information automatically updated by SVN -- please don't edit
Developer_comment: StudyConfig.py provides methods that work with this configuration file. Remember to change them if you change structure of this.
Name: dfols_twin_3param
baseRunID_comment: base for runID. Only first two characters are generally used.
runTime_comment: Time in seconds for run. If null then default value will be used.
runCode_comment: Project coce to run job under.
runUpgrade_vn3: For vn3 put all runXXX stuff in a runInfo block.

defaultParams.comment: All default parameters taken care of within MOPS

initParams.comment: Intial values for parameters to be optimised. For testing only optimising 2 MOPS parameters. Names don't matter, only index locations.

Parameters.initScale_comment: If true then startParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value. MOPS does this internally.

fixedParams.comment: List of parameters and values that are fixed and not modified in optimisation. Set to null to use default values. Taken care of within MOPS.

Parameters.fixedScale_comment: If true then scalable fixedParams range from 0 to 1 where 0 means min value; 1 max value.

minmax.comment: Defines the minimum and maximmum ranges for the parameters. Must be defined for ALL parameters used in GN optimisation,

steps.comment: Steps for perturbations -- norm around 10% of the range. If not specified 10% will be used. Values below have been somewhat tuned.

study.comment: Parameters that specify the study. Used by framework and not by optimisation routines
study.referenceModelDirectory_comment: Directory where reference model configuration exists. Default is START_DIR/start

covariance.comment: Covariance matrices and operations on them. If CovObsErr and CovIntVar are *both* specified then CovTotal will be computed from them
covariance.CovTotal_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for total Error.
covariance.CovTotalDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the total covariance matrix
covariance.CovIntVar_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix of Internal Variability
covariance.CovIntVarDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the internal variability covariance matrix
covariance.CovObsErr_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for Observational Error
covariance.CovObsErrDiagonalise_comment: If true diagonalise the Observational Error covariance matrix

study.ObsList_comment: List of misfits that model produces for algorithm to minimise
study.constraintName_comment: Name of constraint variable -- target value defined by targets/constraintName.

optimise.comment: Parameters to control optimisation. This is used within DFOLS optimisation routines AND not by framework. Will need to be edited for BOBYQA
optimise.algorithm_comment: Algorithm wanted Currently one of DFOLS or GAUSSNEWTON or BOBYQA.
optimise.growing.ndirs_initial_comment: the number of perturbations on first iteration. If not specified then will make Nparm perturbtions
optimise.rhobeg_comment: Radius of parameter trust region at start
optimise.rhoend_comment: Radius of paramter trust region for termination (for our purpose this is in normalised parameters)
optimise.maxfun_comment: Maximum number of model evaluations to be done. Default is O(1000)
optimise.mu_comment: The inverse weighting given to the constraint -- it gets wt 1/(2mu). If Null then no constraint should be applied

DFOLS_namedSettings.logging.save_poisedness_comment: whether or not  to calculate geometry statistics as part of diagnostic information
DFOLS_namedSettings.init.random_initial_directions_comment: If true perturb in random directions. If true perturb along co-ordinate axis.
DFOLS_namedSettings.noise.additive_noise_level_comment: Estimate of noise in cost function. Used in termintion -- nb cost fn is sum of squares **not** sum of squares/nObs
DFOLS_namedSettings.slow.history_for_slow_comment: No of past successful iterations to look at to decide if slow or not
DFOLS_namedSettings.slow.thresh_for_slow_comment: Log cost function  change for slow converegence
DFOLS_namedSettings.slow.max_slow_iters_comment: The number of itertions (once slow determined) to decide making slow progress
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.use_restarts_comment: Restart when slow convergence or too noisy
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.use_soft_restarts_comment: Use soft restart -- reuse some existing points when  restarting
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.soft.num_geom_steps_comment: How many extra runs to be done when restarting
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.soft.move_xk_comment: For soft restarts, whether to preserve ùë•ùëò, or move it to the best new point evaluated. Default is True
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.increase_npt_comment: Increase number of points when restarting
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.increase_npt_amt_comment: Number of points to increase by in restarts.increase_npt set when restarting
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.hard.use_old_rk_comment: If using hard restarts, whether or not to recycle the objective value at the best iterate found when performing a restart. This saves one objective evaluation. Default is True
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.max_unsuccessful_restarts_comme: Number of consecutive restarts allowed when no progress made
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.hard.increase_ndirs_initial_amt: How many points to icnrease by  when doing hard restart (not using any exisiting pts)
DFOLS_namedSettings.restarts.max_npt_comment: Maximum number of points/model evals in each restart

optimise.DFOLS_namedSettings_comment: Settings for named parameters that get passed into dfols vis user_params

BOBYQA_namedSettings.logging.save_poisedness_comment: whether or not  to calculate geometry statistics as part of diagnostic information
BOBYQA_namedSettings.init.random_initial_directions_comment: If true perturb in random directions. If true perturb along co-ordinate axis.
BOBYQA_namedSettings.noise.additive_noise_level_comment: Estimate of noise in cost function. Used in termintion -- nb cost fn is sum of squares **not** sum of squares/nObs
BOBYQA_namedSettings.slow.history_for_slow_comment: No of past successful iterations to look at to decide if slow or not
BOBYQA_namedSettings.slow.thresh_for_slow_comment: Log cost function  change for slow converegence
BOBYQA_namedSettings.slow.max_slow_iters_comment: The number of itertions (once slow determined) to decide making slow progress
BOBYQA_namedSettings.restarts.use_restarts_comment: Restart when slow convergence or too noisy
BOBYQA_namedSettings.restarts.use_soft_restarts_comment: Use soft restart -- reuse some existing points when  restarting
BOBYQA_namedSettings.restarts.soft.num_geom_steps_comment: How many extra runs to be done when restarting
BOBYQA_namedSettings.restarts.hard.use_old_fk_comment: If using hard restarts, whether or not to recycle the objective value at the best iterate found when performing a restart. This saves one objective evaluation. Default is True
BOBYQA_namedSettings.restarts.max_unsuccessful_restarts_comme: Number of consecutive restarts allowed when no progress made

optimise.BOBYQA_namedSettings_comment: Settings for named parameters that get passed into bobyqa via user_params

postProcess.comment: Options to control post processing. Details depend on your post processing script. No post processing necessary?
postProcess.outputPath_comment: output misfit value(s) created by the model for the algorithm to minimise

targets.comment: Observed targets for optimisation. Should include constraint value. Go until insignificant improvement?

scalings.comment: Scalings on observables -- only defined when not 1.0. Done by MOPS!

simulatedObservations.comment: simulated observations -- dummy to be used when there is a model failure and it turns out to be unfixable. Made the netflux very large and the rsr_nhx large. This means that this model has high error.. None for MOPS

SimulatedValues.comment: Values from Initial Cond ensemble -- used for display. None for MOPS.
